entry.title: St John's Wort Topical Oil | Botalife
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botalife
Type: Oils
Price: 42.50

Botalife's St John's Wort (50ml) is a herbal infusion made from dried, organic St John's Wort flowers infused in certified organic cold-pressed olive oil.

  • When applied topically, St John's Wort is healing for sunburn, burns, reddened skin and bruises
  • Aids healing of sores and ulcers
  • Calming for neuralgia and sciatica (inflamed) nerves, and shingles
  • Remedies varicose veins and hemorrhoids
  • This infused oil does NOT offer anti-depressant benefits and not for internal use
  • The ingredients used to prepare this infused oil are Certified Organically Grown without the use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides or herbicides, and have not been fumigated or irradiated

Ingredients

Organic St John's Wort, Organic Cold-Pressed Olive Oil

Directions for use

Caution: St John's Wort is known to be photo-toxic. If applied to skin, stay out of the sun until several hours have passed. Do not apply to broken skin. Prolonged topical use may cause irritation. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep Out of the Reach of Children.

entry.title: Laurel Berry Oil (Cold Pressed) | Botalife
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botalife
Type: Oils
Price: 40.50

Botalife's Laurel Berry Oil (20ml) is a popular Middle Eastern oil used for a variety of skin and hair conditions!

  • Used in Middle Eastern cultures for skin and hair problems such as acne, dry skin, eczema, rashes, psoriasis, rosacea and fungal infections
  • Softens your skin to smooth out wrinkles, fine lines and crow's feet
  • Provides comfort and relief for rheumatism, arthritis, sore joints and muscle pains when used in massage
  • Apply to your scalp or add to your shampoo or conditioner to reduce dandruff and halt thinning hair
  • Does not contain alcohol, parabens, GMO, sulfates, synthetic fragrances, colorings, petrochemicals, silicon, triclosan, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free

Directions for use

Use in massage, as a hair treatment or skin treatment.

Caution: Do not consume. For external use only.

  • 100% natural ingredients with no parabens, petrochemicals, preservatives or other chemical additives

Apply the Hemp Healing Lip Balm to your lips in the morning and throughout the day as needed

entry.title: Love Potion Lip Balm | AFRO Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 20.00

AFRO Indigenous Love Potion Lip Balm contains 100% natural & indigenous plant-based ingredients to keep lifts soft and nourished.
  • Will not cause dry lips like petroleum or chemical based lip balms and glosses
  • Contains indigenous ingredients believed to act as a love charm
  • Beautifully scented with indigenous essential oils
  • Earth conscious company with a love of Africa
  • Contains NO parabens, SLS, petrochemicals, preservatives, artificial fragrances or other chemicals
  • Certified organic and plastic free
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Order branded Lip Balm Dispenser >

Love Potion Lip Balm contains a blend of natural ingredients and is fragranced with indigenous South African essential oils. The essential oils used are believed to contain magical qualities by the local people. Be it here-say, folklore or pure magic, this balm is soothing and smells marvelous!

Ingredients

A moisturising blend of beeswax, avocado butter, coconut oil, macadamia oil, shea butter and sunflower oil with indigenous essential oils.  

Caution: Not recommended for use during pregnancy

Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

AFRO Indigenous Beard Balm contains a blend of natural & organic ingredients from the Cape Floral Kingdoms. It is easy to use and will leave your beard, soft, conditioned and easy to manage. This balm is also soothing and smells like a walk on the mountain!

Ingredients

Bees wax, Macadamia oil, Shea butter, Sunflower oil

Essential Oils: African helichrysum, African wormwood, Cape Geranium & Cape Snowbush.

Directions for use

Apply balm to finger tips and massage into your beard to moisturise and condition.

Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: African Calming Massage Oil Blend | Pure Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 60.50

Pure Indigenous' African Calm Massage Oil (100ml) contains carefully selected indigenous essential oils to promote inner calm, tranquility and relaxation.

  • Free yourself from stress and tension with this calming massage oil blend
  • Used as a body oil OR a massage oil, it promotes skin's elasticity and suppleness
  • May be used directly on skin or blended with a few drops of your preferred Pure Indigenous's essential oil and used as a carrier oil for aromatherapy massage

Ingredients

Kenyan Frankincense, Cape Rose Geranium, African Wormwood, Cape Grape Seed Oil

How to use

Apply a few drops of Calm Massage Oil to the skin or hair for a nourishing treatment. All of Pure Indigenous's carrier oils are also an ideal base to combine a few drops of essential oils for a true Aromatherapy experience.

entry.title: FLAXi Heat Therapy Bags (Pack of 8 Mixed Designs) - SAVE 10%
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 893.00

FLAXi's Heat Therapy Bags (pack of 8 mixed designs) are beautiful 100% cotton hand printed heat therapy bag for aches and pains.

  • 1 x Royal Blue Dots design, 1 x Red Orange Dots design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Dots design, 1 x Charcoal Dots design, 1 x Royal Blue Foliage design, 1 x Red Orange Foliage design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Foliage design, 1 x Charcoal Foliage design
  • Natural heat therapy bags for aches and pains
  • Provides targeted pain relief for conditions such as arthritis, muscular pain, PMS, back pain, restless leg syndrome, tension, fibromyalgia, rheumatic disease, headaches and more
  • Bags made from natural cotton, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

entry.title: Lavender Scented Candle | Lavender in Lavender Hill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Home Products
Price: 91.50

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Scented Candles (sold individually) are made with pure essential lavender oil and lavender flowers - keep your home smelling fresh!

  • Light a candle to harness its aromatherapy benefits and create a peaceful, relaxing ambiance in your home
  • Helps you and your guests by relieving anxiety and restlessness
  • Also looks great as home decor! 
  • Help keep moths and mosquitoes away
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Candle wax, lavender essential oil, lavender flowers
